title: Sports Calendar (Oct. 12)
text:
TOURNAMENTS/EVENTS/CAMPS/MEETINGS 
CYCLING 
• The River Valley Cycling Club hosts four group rides per week open to the public. Tuesday rides start at Fort Chaffee, Thursdays at Beef O’Brady’s and Sundays from Cisterna Market. There is also a women’s-only ride each Sunday at 5 p.m. at Fort Chaffee. Rides are often divided by ability levels, including no-drop rides for beginning road cyclists. Visit Facebook.com/RiverValleyCycling. 
GOLF 
• River Valley Golf Association tournament schedule. Check in by 9 a.m. For info (479) 639-2350. 
— October 12, Wolf Ridge in Poteau. 
— October 19, Winn Mountain in Mountainburg. 
— October 26, Cedars in Van Buren. 
October 31 — Vache Grasse One Person Mulligan tourney. Shotgun start 9 a.m. Entry fee is $35 per person. To sign up you may contact the Vache Grasse Pro shop at 479-996-419 
HIKING 
• The Trailblazers Hiking Club is dedicated to enjoying the outdoors in the Ozarks and Ouachita Mountains of western Arkansas and eastern Oklahoma. The club leads several hikes per month. Visit www.thcfs.com for more information or call (479) 646-9562. 
PLAYERS/TEAMS WANTED 
BASEBALL 
Fort Smith Trojans will be holding tryouts for a 9U tournament team. Tryouts will be held on October 18 at 1 p.m. at Church League Fields (Higgins). Any questions call Nathan 479-926-3911 or Sandy 479-651-1687. 
BASKETBALL 
• Girls Inc. is accepting registrations for the basketball program. Parents can register online at GirlsIncFortsmith.org or visit the Nancy Orr Center at 1415 Old Greenwood Road between 9 a.m. and 6 p.m. or call (479) 782-0375. 
BOXING 
• The Fort Smith Boxing Club for youth boxers is forming. The gym is located at 1525 May Avenue. For more information, call Harold Corley at (479) 646-0876. 
• The Boys & Girls Club of Paris boxing program is open to boys and girls, ages 8-18. Cost is $10 per year. A member of USA Boxing, the team has three weekly workouts from September-May and attends tournaments on the weekends. Call (479) 963-3577. 
The Sports Calendar runs free in the Times Record each Monday and daily at www.swtimes.com . Email information to bsanderford@swtimes.com . Entries are not accepted over the phone. Business advertisements are not eligible for the calendar. The deadline is Friday at noon.
